data.text: @stephenpollard You accidentally included the word ‘recent’ in your tweet Stephen 👍

@stephenpollard The way Imran Khan prostrated in the shrine is a major form of shirk and until he repents to Allah(SWT) for that very action, he will not be successful. Muhammad Qasim was shown this in his dream in July 2018. https://t.co/dO30JBuwIY https://t.co/VpmNrt0I3u https://t.co/QeJo75Jw6G

@stephenpollard I'm afraid the government are prepared to argue black is white to make covid go away in the media and in the minds of the bulk of the general public. Javid said today that infections are falling even though data is showing a marked uptick..
@stephenpollard It’s crazy. For example they recognised that loss of smell and taste was a symptom before it was made official through people’s reporting.

@stephenpollard Don't really understand this. Feels like an extremely easy, 'cheap' way to monitor for almost any kind of future disease, in addition to Covid, without even the hassle of a government department having to manage it all.
@stephenpollard Yes it is bonkers. But has this govt ever shown any semblance of a thought process beyond its mindless hit-and-hope populism?

@stephenpollard It's barely a rounding error in terms of government spending in this area alone. On the face of it seems wildly short-sighted and parochial. It's like deciding to fly without radar because you'd rather not pay for the electricity it would take to power the machines.
